entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening then light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
